channel.title: Command to give Membership

item.title: Command to give Membership
item.dc:creator: @kiamyhelp kiamyhelp
item.description:
@kiamyhelp wrote:

go into ur data files and add the desired players name into the “members” folder

then go put there ismember=1 but wen u do this part make sure there logged out.

but on my server u do

::makemem(name)

no space^

then u kick them and they should be a mem

Read full topic

item.title: Command to give Membership
item.dc:creator: @Get_Forgotten Get_Forgotten
item.description:
@Get_Forgotten wrote:

I Cant figure out how to add a command to give membership that actually works… Going into the character file and setting

playerIsMember = 1;

doesn’t give membership for some reason… I haven’t even tried to make a server since the membership code has been added… so any help is greatly appreciated.

Read full topic
